description.en: Quest Item: A scary potrait. Who would paint something like that?
description.ar: Quest Item: A scary potrait. Who would paint something like that?
description.br: (Quest) Um retrato assustador. Quem pintaria algo assim?
description.cns: 任务物品：一个可怕的肖像。谁会画那样的东西？
description.de: (Questitem) Ein schauriges Porträt. Wer würde so etwas malen?
description.fi: Quest Item: A scary potrait. Who would paint something like that?
description.fil: Quest Item: A scary potrait. Who would paint something like that?
description.fr: (Ils sont tous en rouge et ont le regard féroce, utilisent des épées acérées et d'énormes marteaux)
description.id: Item Quest: Potret yang menakutkan. Siapa yang akan melukis sesuatu seperti itu?
description.it: Quest Item: A scary potrait. Who would paint something like that?
description.jp: どこかの洞窟を越え、高い山々が連なっている場所に野営地のような跡がみえる。（クエストアイテム）
description.kr: 퀘스트 아이템: 무서운 초상화. 누가 이런 그림을 그릴까요?
description.nl: Quest Item: A scary potrait. Who would paint something like that?
description.pl: Quest Item: A scary potrait. Who would paint something like that?
description.ru: Quest Item: A scary potrait. Who would paint something like that?
description.sp: Objeto de Misión: Un retrato aterrador. ¿Quién pintaría algo así?
description.sw: Quest Item: A scary potrait. Who would paint something like that?
description.th: Quest Item: ภาพเหมือนที่น่ากลัว ใครจะวาดอะไรแบบนั้น?
description.tw: 任務道具：可怕的肖像。誰會畫那樣的東西？
description.vi: Vật phẩm nhiệm vụ: Một potrait đáng sợ. Ai sẽ vẽ một cái gì đó như thế?
